name: Anime Feet
description:
The game

Anime Feet is a puzzle game, each level comes with an increase in the challenge. 2 Unique exclusive puzzle formulas await you, every level got unique hand drawn artwork.

Features

- Enjoy 16 levels + 2 included with the FREE DLC.

- Unlock the gallery, revealing our pretty girls with cute feet by completing the levels.

- Unlock achievements.
